item.title: I Know The Perfect Way For Avengers: Secret Wars To Redeem Hayley Atwell’s Captain Carter After Her Latest Comments About The Hero's MCU Ending
item.description: Hayley Atwell was underwhelmed by Captain Carter's Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness cameo, and Avengers: Secret Wars can redeem her.

item.title: Tom Hiddleston Breaks His Silence On Returning To The MCU As Loki In Avengers: Doomsday
item.description: As Loki is set to return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Avengers: Doomsday, Tom Hiddleston is finally opening up about his next appearance.

item.title: I’m Worried We May Never See This Powerful MCU Phase 5 Hero Again After Avengers: Doomsday’s Cast Announcement
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday's cast announcement left out some huge names, and I reckon there's one powerful hero from Phase 5 that would fit in perfectly.

item.title: Jessica Simpson and Eric Johnson Hanging Out Together Amid Split
item.description: Jessica Simpson was seen hanging out recently with none other than her hubby Eric Johnson amid their split and rumors they're getting a divorce, TMZ h...

item.title: Kurt Cobain's Smashed Guitar to Be Auctioned for $30K
item.description: Nirvana fans have something on the way ... one of Kurt Cobain's guitars is going up for auction -- and it's got quite a history with the late rocker. ...
